${ModID}:Lariat.NAME: Lariat
${ModID}:Lariat.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies twice. NL Your next Skill costs 0.

${ModID}:GigaDrill.NAME: Giga Drill
${ModID}:GigaDrill.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage. NL The top {!M!|1=card|@=!M! cards} of your draw pile costs 0 until played.

${ModID}:OpeningStrike.NAME: Opening Strike
${ModID}:OpeningStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Reduce the cost of all cards in your hand by 1 this turn.

${ModID}:Withstand.NAME: Withstand
${ModID}:Withstand.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain !B! Block X times.

${ModID}:Approach.NAME: Approach
${ModID}:Approach.DESCRIPTION: Scry !M!. NL Draw cards until you draw a 1 cost.

${ModID}:SheerEffort.NAME: Sheer Effort
${ModID}:SheerEffort.DESCRIPTION: Play !M! cards in your hand. NL Exhaust.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Used in hand card selection screen.

${ModID}:Overcome.NAME: Overcome
${ModID}:Overcome.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card with an original cost higher than your energy, gain !M! Block.

${ModID}:FurtherBeyond.NAME: Further Beyond
${ModID}:FurtherBeyond.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played if you have no [E]. NL Deal !D! damage.

${ModID}:MakeRoom.NAME: Make Room
${ModID}:MakeRoom.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL If you would draw while your hand is full, play the leftmost card first.

${ModID}:ActuallyFinalForm.NAME: Final Form
${ModID}:ActuallyFinalForm.DESCRIPTION: Add 2 random Form Powers to your hand. NL They cost !M! less this combat.
